title: Bug 115938Issues in the Library feature
description: The following issues are noticed Cannot add report items to container report items in layout of a libraryAs a result user cannot add labels or text items to a grid/table item. In the library spec, there is no plan for separate library perspective, butthe actuate implementation has a separate library perspective. If a report design does not include a library, and if a user tries to drag areport item from the library exploer to report design, the user should beprovided the option to include hte library.
